programme.title: Hero Dubai Desert Classic Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy won the 2024 Dubai Desert Classic, finishing at 14-under after overcoming a ten-shot deficit.

programme.title: Rory McIlroy Gives Putting Lesson In Dubai
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy gives an exclusive putting clinic

programme.title: Roots: Ryan Fox
programme.desc: Roots features Ryan Fox in New Zealand, sharing his legacy and path to becoming a Tour winner.

programme.title: Ras Al Khaimah Championship Day 4 2025
programme.desc: Alejandro del Rey won the Ras Al Khaimah Championship with a 266 (-22), four strokes ahead of Marcus Armitage.

programme.title: BMW PGA Championship Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Billy Horschel defeated Rory McIlroy on the second playoff hole at the BMW PGA Championship, making an eagle on the par-5 18th. Horschel birdied 18 in regulation to tie McIlroy and Thriston Lawrence, who was eliminated after the first playoff hole.

programme.title: Tour Pros Play Mini Golf: Rose vs Horschel
programme.desc: Justin Rose vs. Billy Horschel in a thrilling 8-hole battle!

programme.title: FedEx Open de France Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Dan Bradbury secured his biggest win with a flawless 67, pulling ahead with three straight birdies.

programme.title: Mic'd Up Matches: Bradbury V Brown
programme.desc: Mic'd Up Matches - Episode 3: Dan Bradbury vs. Dan Brown in a thrilling 9-hole match at Sotogrande!

programme.title: Omega European Masters Highlights Show 2024
programme.desc: Matt Wallace ended a six-year drought with victory after 73 holes but finished 112th in the FedEx Cup, missing the playoffs.

programme.title: Callaway Tour Tips: Willett and Wallace
programme.desc: Best Golf tips from Willet and Wallace

programme.title: Bapco Energies Bahrain Championship Day 4 2025
programme.desc: Laurie Canter won the 2025 Bahrain Champs at 14-under, beating Brown & Larrazábal in a playoff with a birdie

programme.title: Luck of The Draw: Pieters vs Canter
programme.desc: Thomas Pieters and Laurie Canter face off on the 620-yard par-5 18th hole at Jumeirah Golf Estates' Earth Course.
